product_name: The North Face  Morgan Soft-Shell Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Stand out on the slopes in The North Face Morgan women's soft-shell jacket. Unlike so many hum-drum winter jackets, it features an eye-catching plaid pattern.
